text: {| class="infobox vcard" style="float: right; margin: 0 0 .5em .5em; width: 24em; font-size: 90%; text-align: left; background: #FFFFFF; border:#009E58 1px solid #FF0000;" cellspacing="1" |+ style="font-size: larger;" | 2005 Monaco GP2 round |- ! colspan="3" style="text-align: center;" font-size: larger; style="background:#efefef;" | Round details |- |colspan="3" style="text-align:center;" |Round 3 of 12 rounds in the 2005 GP2 Series season. |- | colspan="3" style="text-align: center;" 200px |- | Location |colspan=2| Circuit de Monaco, Monte Carlo, Monaco |- | Course |colspan=2| Permanent racing facility |- ! colspan="3" style="text-align: center; font-size: larger; color:white; background:#000000; " class="fn" | GP2 Series |- ! colspan="3" style="text- align: center; font-size: larger; style="background:#efefef;"; class=fn"| Feature race |- | style="width: 20%;" | Date | colspan=2| 21 May 2005 |- | Laps |colspan=2| 44 |- !colspan="3" style="text-align: center; style="background:#efefef;""| Pole position |- | Driver | Heikki Kovalainen | Arden International |- | Time |colspan=2| 1:24.665 |- !colspan="3" style="text-align: center; style="background:#efefef;""| Podium |- | First || Adam Carroll || Super Nova Racing |- | Second || Gianmaria Bruni || Coloni Motorsport |- | Third || Nico Rosberg || ART Grand Prix |- !colspan="3" style="text-align: center; style="background:#efefef;""| Fastest Lap |- | Driver | Heikki Kovalainen | Arden International |- | Time |colspan=2| 1:23.864 (on lap 44) |} The 2005 Monaco GP2 round was a GP2 Series motor race held on 21 May 2005 at the Circuit de Monaco in Monte Carlo, Monaco. It was the third race of the 2005 GP2 Series season. The race was used to support the 2005 Monaco Grand Prix. There was only one race, held on Saturday. Polesitter Heikki Kovalainen finished fifth after an unsuccessful pit-stop, but was able to set the fastest lap. Irishman Adam Carroll, who started third, won the race by a margin of 0.657 seconds from Gianmaria Bruni.
